mapper.update: UPDATE sys_user SET username = #{username}, telephone = #{telephone}, mail = #{mail}, remark = #{remark}, dept_id = #{deptId}, status = #{status}, supplier_id = #{supplierId}, managed_supplier_ids = #{managedSupplierIds}, operator = #{operator}, operate_time = now(), operate_ip = #{operateIp} WHERE id = #{id}
